thread.title: Jabong puts me in the Spotlight
thread.title_full: Jabong puts me in the Spotlight

author: Sankara Subramanian (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Jabong puts me in the Spotlight
text: Tweet Wow! Wow! This is a very proud moment for me! Jabong.com’s fashion and lifestyle print magazine, ‘ The Juice ’ has featured me in their July 2015 edition. This edition, which covers the superbloggers of India across fashion, film, sport, art, travel, food, music, tv and more, has put together a list of the best Indian blogs that you need to follow. And I have been put in the spotlight in the ‘ TRAVEL ’ category where they give my blog the title of the ‘ BEST TRAVEL RESOURCES ’. There are 3 bloggers in the travel category: Shivya Nath of ‘ The Shooting Star ’ gets the ‘BEST TRAVEL WRITING’ award, Siddhartha Joshi of ‘ The Wanderer ’ gets the ‘BEST TRAVEL PHOTOS’ award and I get the ‘BEST TRAVEL RESOURCES’ award. Shivya and Sid are great travel bloggers. You should definitely follow them, if not already. This Jabong magazine issue has a great list of other bloggers across a variety of categories that is worth checking out. Thank you Jabong Magazine for the feature!!
